about_the_game:
Exclusive to Steam VR & from the Creators who brought you the Multi-Award Winning Swordy Quest, comes their latest creation, RPG Fitness VR!

Get ready to embark on a thrilling adventure in RPG Fitness VR, where crafting, hunting, gathering and climbing combine to create a gaming experience like no other. With immersive virtual reality graphics, you'll feel like you're truly a part of this enchanted world, with the power to explore, conquer and survive in a fully-realized 3D environment.

But RPG Fitness VR isn't just a game, it's also a workout! By keeping you active and engaged, you'll get in shape while you explore new worlds and face new challenges. Whether you're battling against fierce monsters, gathering resources, or climbing towering peaks, you'll be constantly moving and exercising.

Craft your own weapons, hunt for food, and gather resources as you explore this vast and wondrous world. With a huge variety of items to find and weapons to craft, you'll always have a new challenge to tackle. And with new obstacles and enemies added regularly, you'll never run out of adventures to embark on.

And with the power of virtual reality, you'll feel like you're truly a part of this world. The immersive 3D graphics and 360-degree gameplay will make you feel like you're actually there, giving you the ultimate gaming experience. Whether you're exploring ancient ruins, navigating treacherous forests, or battling against fierce beasts, you'll feel like you're right in the thick of the action.

So what are you waiting for? Get your VR headset ready and start your Fitness Quest today! With its combination of gameplay, exercise, and virtual reality, you'll never have more fun or get in better shape. Join the RPG Fitness VR community and see where your journey takes you! With so much to explore, conquer and experience, RPG Fitness VR is the perfect game for gamers who want a unique and active experience.


FEATURES
● Open World Environment - allowing you to explore grasslands, oceans, mountains & more
● Get fit while playing an RPG (e.g. Use your arms to walk around the island and climb to hidden areas. Manually craft & mine for items using arm movements)
● Enemies around every corner!
● Weapon crafting - where finding the right materials is key to fending off enemies
● Survival aspects - requiring careful resource management
● Hidden Upgrade items - finding them can mean the difference between life & death
● Eye-catching graphics - transport you to another world
● Intuitive navigation system
● Player customization through levelling system
● & much, much more...


THANKS

Special Thanks to Duke54 for the Height Map!
Sound effects and music obtained from Zapsplat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX Vega 56 8GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: From the Creators who brought you the Multi-Award Winning Swordy Quest, comes RPG Fitness VR! Imagine waking up with no name, food or supplies. Where are you? It doesn't matter now. Set in a Fantasy and Living World, your goal is clear: Save humanity. Can you unlock the secrets of RPG Fitness VR?
